title: Diwa
description: The essential app for Thailand's lifestyle. Discover events nationwide, buy tickets, and get personalized picks. Create your own community, sell merch, and support locals. Connect with friends and unlock fun experiences near you, anywhere, anytime.
details: Diwa is an integrated digital ecosystem designed as the definitive resource for Thai events, utilizing advanced, location-aware algorithms to facilitate personalized, nationwide event discovery while empowering creators with fully integrated commerce tools for hosting, ticketing, merchandise sales, community building, and direct local support.

title: pillsync
description: The Smart Box, Reminder Bracelet, and App form an AI/OCR-powered NCD medical system. Guarantees timely doses for the elderly, linking users, caretakers, and doctors with vital analytics for seamless care.
details: Pillsync is an innovative medical adherence system designed to help elderly patients manage their medication. It combines a smart pillbox, a reminder bracelet, and a mobile app powered by AI and OCR technology to ensure timely dosage and provide vital analytics to caregivers and doctors.

title: project lumphini
description: A Pixel Art, Isometric 3D RPG that uses GPS and AR to transform park walking into a real-time adventure. Battle mythical creatures to free Lumphini Park from the dark entity Ratri, earning global rewards through Missions and Challenges.
details: Project Lumphini is a location-based RPG that gamifies the experience of walking in Lumphini Park. Using GPS and AR technology, players can explore a pixel-art recreation of the park, battle mythical creatures, and complete missions to earn rewards. The game aims to promote physical activity and engagement with the local environment.

title: Herobook
description: Step into a lifelike re-creation of a Thai temple. Explore hidden paths, collect mysterious boxes and vibrant orbs to unlock secrets and new possibilities. Ideal B2B cultural exploration platform.
details: Herobook offers an immersive virtual tour of a Thai temple, allowing users to explore its architecture and history in a gamified environment. Users can collect items and unlock secrets as they navigate the lifelike recreation, making it an engaging tool for cultural education and exploration.

title: FISH: Fish Ifsh Sfih Hfis
description: A chaotic, ULTRAKILL-inspired FPS developed by 40 creators in just 12 days. Experience fast-paced action with the tagline ''Mankind is dead. Blood is fuel. Fish is full?'' â€”bugs included, passion guaranteed.
details: FISH is a high-octane FPS game created during a 12-day game jam. Inspired by ULTRAKILL, it features fast-paced combat and a chaotic art style. The project was a collaborative effort involving 40 creators, resulting in a unique and energetic gaming experience.

title: Zendit
description: A hyper-stylized, fast-paced 3D delivery challenge built with Unity. Navigate a vibrant open-world map as a precision courier, rapidly dispatching packages to diverse clients. Master urban navigation, race the clock, and unlock upgrades to top the leaderboard.
details: Zendit is a 3D delivery game where players take on the role of a courier in a vibrant open world. The game challenges players to deliver packages quickly and efficiently while navigating complex urban environments. It features a stylized art direction and fast-paced gameplay mechanics.
